title: Our doctor
htmlContent:
Dentist in Lansdown, VA - Dr. Paul Ellington - Cosmetic & Family Oral Care

Dr. Ellington is originally from Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He attended Grove City College, where he earned a Bachelor of Science Degree in Biology.  He then moved to Virginia, where he graduated from the Medical College of Virginia.  He has been in practice in Countryside since December of 1987.  Dr. Ellington currently resides in Ashburn with his wife and three children. 

As an active member of the American Dental Association and the Northern Virginia Dental Society, Dr. Ellington believes in the importance of continuing education.  His areas of special interest are dental  reconstruction and cosmetic dentistry.  The Ellington Family is very active in local children’s sports including soccer and basketball.  For fun in their spare time they enjoy traveling to Bethany Beach with their English Springer Spaniel, Bronson.  

Dr. Ellington enjoys swimming, exercise, golfing and just relaxing on the beach.

Meet our teammates before scheduling your next appointment.

title: Meet Our Team
htmlContent:
Meet the great team at
Lansdowne Family & Cosmetic Dentistry!

   

 

 

 

HYGIENE

Niloofar Kamali, CDA/Registered Dental Hygienist
Joyce Kwiatkowski-Spieler, CDA/Registered Dental Hygienist 

DENTAL ASSISTANTS

Debi Turner, Dental Assistant
   
FRONT DESK/OFFICE ADMINISTRATION

Susie Sarina, Office Manager / Financial Administrator

 

  

Susie/ Practice manager

Susie has over 25 years experience as a dental practice manager and loves working with patients.  She understands that each patient has unique wants and needs, and enjoys providing one-on-one attention to each person.  Susie is an expert in dental insurance and obtains maximum benefits as well as provides creative financial arrangements that suit each individual’s needs. Susie loves to spend time with her friends, three children, and she has six beautiful grandchildren that keep her laughing.  Her greatest passions include, travel, wellness, physical activity, experiencing and learning new things, exploring wineries, and the great outdoors. 

 Debi/ Dental assistant                       

Debi studied at Florida State and has now been in Virginia since 1980.  With more than 24 years of experience as a dental assistant, she is committed to every patient.  Debi is a people person, and loves working with and learning about patients.  The combination of working so closely with patients, and the incredible opportunity to learn and grow makes this the perfect job. When Debi is not working she likes to spend time with her family and friends.

She is married, has 4 children and 9 grandchildren that keeps her busy.  She loves Disneyworld and is one of the regulars there. 

  Cathy/ Accountant
 Niloo/ Registered dental hygienist

Niloo joined Lansdowne family and cosmetic dentistry team in 2007, and has 14 years of dentistry experience including hygiene and assisting.

She is passionate about a patient’s dental and whole body health and loves working with them to improve.  She has received a BS in chemistry in 1996 and earned her dental hygiene degree with honors from Northern Virginia Community College. For the comfort and convenience of our patients, Niloo is certified in local anesthesia and nitrous oxide and licensed to practice in Virginia and Maryland.

Niloo prides herself on being friendly and honest.  Her patients love her gentle touch and consciousness to their dental needs.  She has one young daughter and is married.  She loves walking, biking, kayaking, and being outside and shopping. 



  

Joyce:  RDH, CDA

Joyce’s first dental experience as a patient exposed her to a gentle, empathetic dental team. This experience influenced her 40 years of sharing the same thoughtful and caring experience with her patients. Her dental education started at Northern Virginia Community College, where she became a certified dental assistant with Magna cum Laude honors. Years later, she pursued further education as a registered dental hygienist at Virginia Western Community College graduating with Summa cum Laude honors.

                A local pediatric office invited Joyce to start her journey as a registered dental hygienist. Many years have passed; taking Joyce through hundreds of hours of lifelong continuing education including University of Minnesota Senior Care Mini-residency, local anesthesia, and laser administration. These skills enhance her ability to share great passion for health promotion, dental disease prevention and advanced patient care.

                Joyce’s family has been living and thriving in the Sterling area for over 37 years. In her spare time Joyce loves sharing sports, gardening, astronomy, wood working, cooking adventures and so much more with her family, friends and friends to be.

Lansdowne Dentistry - Cosmetic, Family & Senior Oral Care

Our Lansdowne, VA dental office is dedicated to the care of children, adults and seniors. Our comprehensive services can be personalized to meet the needs of all patients in varying stages of growth or health.  Dr. Ellington and his team are proud to serve patients from nearby retirement communities, including Leisure World, with dental restorations and smile enhancing prosthesis. 

No matter what your concerns about your smile may be, our team is here to help.

A History of Service and Quality Dentistry in Lansdowne

Dr. Ellington provided dental care in the Countryside area for years before establishing this location to serve area patients. Lansdowne Family & Cosmetic Dentistry’s office was originally established in the 1990’s, with Dr. Ellington acquiring the practice in 2009. Since then, Dr. Ellington has served the Lansdowne community with a range of dental services that help patients to enjoy better oral health and more attractive, functional smiles. 

Our friendly team is here to support your health through all phases of treatment. We take gentle care of young patients and make sure to treat seniors with solutions that improve both quality of life and confidence.  Our new patient goodie bags even include free, take-home whitening kits so you can get started on the smile you want with services from our office right away.

Specializing in Cosmetics and Restorative Prosthetics

Our dental therapies make it easy to achieve the smile of your dreams and repair damage caused by tooth decay, chips, cracks, or years of staining and discoloration. With cosmetic procedures that include veneers, teeth whitening, and white dental fillings, we can ensure that your treatment is seamless and helps to promote both the appearance and strength of restored teeth.

In addition to aesthetic services, Dr. Ellington can also provide customized denture care for patients who are missing some or all of their natural teeth. Our denture and partial denture treatments incorporate custom fittings to ensure that your new prosthetic is comfortable, secure, and visually appealing. For patients are looking for a more permanent way to restore lost teeth, we can work with specialists to add dental implants to your denture treatment. For more information on dentistry specifically tailored for senior dental patients, visit our senior dentistry page.

We Welcome New and Returning Patients – Call our Office Today

Dr. Ellington and his team look forward to treating you! For more information about available services from our Landsdowne dental office, browse our website or call us today to schedule your appointment.
